roleset.name: smear, apply, physical smearing of a substance on a surface
roleset.note: SPREAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spread' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes spray-9.7-1 and entity_specific_modes_being-47.2; no other framed members. Comparison to 'apply'. (from spread.01-v predicate notes)
SPREAD-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on spread-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls spray-9.7-1. (from spread.01-n)

example.name: spread-v: passivized
example.text: She said the move would result in a after-tax charge of less than $4 million *trace* *trace*-1 to be spread *trace*-1 over the next three quarters.

example.name: spread-v: all args, active
example.text: John spread the peanut butter onto the bread with his fingers.

example.name: spread-v: instrumental subject
example.text: Feathers don't spread peanut butter very well.

example.name: spread-v: args 1 and 2
example.text: And ?schmear? is a Yiddish word that originally referred to the spread of cream cheese on a bagel ..

roleset.name: extend, ranging
roleset.note: SPREAD-V NOTES: This roleset id="spread.02" can be distinguished from the other by thepresence/absence of a trace in the object position, pointing to theArg1. If the above examples was "The oil (was) spread *trace* over thewater" then "the water" would be an Arg2 "surface" not an ArgM.Follow the syntax! (from spread.02-v)
SPREAD-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on spread-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls appear-48.1.1, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2. (from spread.02-n)
SPREAD_OUT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from spread.04-j)

role.descr: diretion or location (for location use loc)

example.name: spread-v: ergative, with direction
example.text: ``The way that we've been managing Campbell U.S.A. can hopefully spread to other areas of the company,'' Mr. Baum said.
example.arg: The way that we 've been managing Campbell U.S.A.
to other areas of the company

example.name: spread-v: ergative, with location
example.text: The oil spread over the water.

example.name: spread-n: just arg1
example.text: successful developments and marketing of this new medicine would help prevent the spread of Diabetes II in such developing countries as China , India and Africa , etc .

roleset.name: cause to be widely located or distributed
roleset.note: SPREAD-V NOTES: Actually quite similar to the "smear" roleset id="spread.05" except for the semanticqualities of the Arg1. And no surface or instrument. (from spread.03-v)
SPREAD-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on spread-v.03. (from spread.03-n)

example.name: spread_out-v
example.text: Cal spread out his cards on the table, revealing his three lovely ladies and the two tens.
example.arg: revealing his three lovely ladies and the two tens

example.name: spread_out-j: arg1
example.text: My texts may be somewhat spread out . Distracted .
